      "key": "38ccdcf2e12c3baeb2f4413e4087d20fea62caf2",

      "link": "https://shows.acast.com/thecomedianscomedianpodcast/episodes/286-sindhuvee-liveatpodfestbirmingham-",
      "description": "A disciple of \"chaotic joy\", Sindhu Vee's rise to standup stardom is about as meteoric as they get; just a hop and a skip from the open mic circuit, to award nominations and appearances on \"QI\" and \"Have I Got News For You\".
